page.title: 11CLUBS IN GILWERN 2
page.content: GILWERN UNDER 12'S FOOTBALL TEAM_The boys meet on Mondays through out the Winter months at the playing fields.The team plays in the Sunday football league and also enters cup and indoor tournaments. GILWERN BOYS CLUB_Boys attend the club on Friday evenings at The Old School.The members play many recreational activities and can also purchase refreshments. YOUTH CLUB_The club meets on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays at the Community Centre.Activities include cooking,pool,snooker,table tennis, basketball,netball,dancing and members are also allowed to watch television. The other clubs that exist in Gilwern are_GILWERN UNDER 12'S CRICKET TEAM, GIRLS FRIENDLY SOCIETY and a RHYTHMIC GYMNASTICS CLUB.
